item.title: ASICS introduces its lightest-ever cushioning shoe for runners
item.description:
Source: ASICS. The DynaFlyte. ASICS has released its lightest cushioned running shoe to date. The DynaFlyte combines lightness and cushioning with a full-length FlyteFoam midsole, utilizing the company’s patented midsole technology in its most basic form. According to ASICS, the shoe’s reduced weight minimizes energy loss during the stride, resulting in more efficient running and the potential for increased speed at any distance. Balancing efficient cushioning with minimizing weight is a significant challenge in running shoe design...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/asics-introduces-its-lightest-ever-cushioning-shoe-for-runners/

item.title: ASICS introduces the versatile fuzeX TR, an all-in-one fitness solution
item.description:
Source: ASICS. The fuzeX TR training shoe. ASICS has introduced the fuzeX TR, a training shoe designed for greater workout efficiency with its lightweight cushioning and versatile design. This all-in-one shoe supports athletes of all backgrounds and experience levels, accommodating activities from high-intensity interval training (HIIT) and weightlifting to treadmill running. The fuzeX TR launch is part of ASICS’s larger expansion into the training category, a market expected to exceed US$55 billion globally by 2020...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/asics-introduces-the-versatile-fuzex-tr-an-all-in-one-fitness-solution/
